attributes.action: ban the payment of high bonuses to top bankers. The estimated billion pounds expected to be paid out should be placed into a fund for people who have lost their jobs as a result of the negligent risk taking and poor decision making that have led this country into recession.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is wholly immoral for the people at the top of the banks to be paid (in many cases) six figure sums, whilst people are losing their jobs every day and struggling to make ends meet.  It is right and proper that banking staff in branches who perform well should be paid bonuses, however, in the current climate, those at the top should sacrifice their bonuses for the greater good, regardless of contractual arrangements.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
